section.p: You put your feet up at the house provided for you by the grateful islanders. You can rest here as long as you want, so if injured you can now restore your Stamina to its normal unwounded score. You can also leave money and possessions here to save carrying them around. Record in the box anything you are leaving. Each time you return, .

outcomes.outcome: Everything just as you left it

section.p: When you are finished here, choose where to go now.
